title: Download UD/UCMDB chart package
content:
You need to download the UD/UCMDB chart package from the Software website to a control plane node (embedded Kubernetes) or the bastion node (managed Kubernetes).

To do this, follow these steps:

  1. Download the UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X.zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website.
  2. Copy the file to a temporary directory. 

  3. Unzip the UD/UCMDB installation package:

    unzip UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X.zip

    The unzipped files are as follows:

    • ucmdb-helm-charts-XX.X.tgz
    • ucmdb-helm-charts-XX.X.tgz.sig
    • Read_Me.pdf
  4. (Optional) Verify the UD/UCMDB installation package. Skip this step if you don't want to verify the package. 
    To verify the UD/UCMDB installation package, visit KM000003948 to download the attached compressed tar file and get detailed steps to verify signatures. Unzip the downloaded file, locate the ot-package-sign.pub key, and use it to verify the package.
  5. Untar the UD/UCMDB chart package: 
    cd UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/
tar -xvzf ucmdb-helm-charts-XX.X.tgz

    The following table describes the essential files inside the UD/UCMDB chart package:

    UD/UCMDB chart package

    Name

    File

    UCMDB helm chart file

    UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/ucmdb-helm-charts/charts/ucmdb-1.xx.x-xxx+2x.x.x.tgz

    Example PV yaml file

    UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/ucmdb-helm-charts/samples/ucmdb-pv.yaml

    Example values.yaml file

    For standalone containerized UD/UCMDB environment:

    UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/ucmdb-helm-charts/samples/values.yaml

    For shared IdM (suite IdM) environment (non-FIPS mode):

    UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/ucmdb-helm-charts/samples/values-with-smax.yaml

    For shared IdM (suite IdM) environment (FIPS mode):

    UCMDB_Helm_Chart-XX.X/ucmdb-helm-charts/samples/values-fips-with-smax.yaml
